title: bmcl启动器出现错误，解决方法(高额、速求)
author: Fcy_lity
txt_content:
开bmcl启动器，开出个这个来：

错误如下

Unable to find aversion of the runtime to run this application.

求解

replies.author: yeyaowei
replies.txt_content:
http://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/details.aspx?id=17718
